headline: 5 Soft Drinks Stocks Showing Resilience Amid Cost & Tariff Woes
summary: Beverages - Soft Drinks industry presents growth opportunities, driven by innovation and digital transformation. Yet, it grapples with cost inflation, tariff uncertainties and supply-chain challenges. Top players such as KO, PEP, MNST, KDP and PRMB stand out as strong investment options.

headline: Coca-Cola (KO) Up 1.8% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Continue?
summary: Coca-Cola (KO) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: 3 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: The Oracle of Omaha, as Warren Buffett is known, has an incredible track record as an investor, and he frequently offers words of wisdom to his many fans.  If you're looking for some investments to shore up your own portfolio as the volatility on Wall Street intensifies, Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN), American Express (NYSE: AXP), and Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) are three great and resilient stocks that have also earned Buffett's stamp of approval.

headline: 35.2% of Warren Buffett's $281 Billion Portfolio Is Invested in 3 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks
summary: Warren Buffett is the CEO of the Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B) holding company, where he oversees a $281 billion portfolio of publicly traded stocks and securities, in addition to several privately held subsidiaries.  Berkshire is also sitting on a record $334 billion in cash, which Buffett and his team can deploy when they spot new opportunities.  Had you invested $1,000 in Berkshire stock when Buffett took the helm in 1965, it would be worth an eye-popping $44.7 million today.
